WRITING.TEXT: He doesn't even know what he's talking about. The deal hasn't been revealed yet. People really have no idea how trade negotiations work or how to conduct them. You want a fair deal for your country? You want trade to help you (because you *do* need trade and it *can* be helpful)? You're going to need to get with the program and stop shooting yourself in the foot by exposing the negotiations to criticism in the womb.
